input.sentences: [female] would not smile no matter what i did .
i let her run around outside to get a smile out of her .
[male] had no problem smiling for the camera .
[male] held down his chair while i took pictures of the kids .
[female] and grandpa spent some time together in the hammock .
output.sentences: A little girl with light brown hair looks seriously towards the camera.
The little girl then goes outside and dance alone.
A little boy with a pacifier seems happy.
An elderly man sits on a blue couch and smiles.
the little girl and man sit happily together on the hammock.
